content: **knitted head band in drops puna piece is knitted in rib and with cable mid front ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern pu-037 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- size s/m m/l l/xl head circumference approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm = 21 1/4 /22 22 /22 3/4 22 3/4 /23 5/8 measurements circumference approx 49-51-53 cm = 19 1/4 -20 -21 height approx 10 cm = 4 **materials** drops puna from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50-50-100 g color 15 north sea ---------------------------------------------------------- accessories for the piece **knitting gauge ** 22 stitches in width and 30 row vertically in stockinette stitch = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 needles drops needles size 3 5 mm = us 4 needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to smaller needles
